name: Fishes! Way To Survive
description:
In the deep ocean, there are all kinds of fishes, every day they are playing surviving games!
Now you are one of them, join in the battleground, fight against those unknown fishes!
Remember, don't trust anyone, there is only one can survive in this game!

Features:
Easy control -- Maybe this is the easiest way to play a surviving game! You just need one finger!
Terrific graphics -- You'll be lost in the deep ocean and kinds of fishes!
Build your aquarium -- Beat those fishes and collect them in your beautiful aquarium!

Follow us Facebook:
